DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this project is to provide comprehensive longitudinal assessments of a cohort of PD patients before, during, and after DBS surgery, including neurological, neurophysiological, and neuropsychological data.
DOC.brief_title: Circuit-Based Deep Brain Stimulation for Parkinson's Disease; Udall Clinical Core
DOC.criteria: Age 2285 years Diagnosis of Parkinson's disease Candidate for DBS Other significant neurological disorder Diagnosis of dementia Prior history of stereotactic neurosurgery for treatment of Parkinson's disease, tremor, or dystonia. Pregnant women
